master-use-flags.title: Master Override
master-use-flags.description: Toggle this off to use Launch Darkly instead.

enable-payment-settings.title: Enable Payment Settings
enable-payment-settings.description: Enables the payment settings interface (applies to nav item, routes and components).

enable-payment-settings-dashboard.title: Enable Payment Settings Dashboard
enable-payment-settings-dashboard.description: Enables the payment settings dashboard interface.

enable-reports.title: Enable Reports
enable-reports.description: Enables the reports nav item, route and page.

enable-intercom.title: Enable Intercom
enable-intercom.description: Enables the Intercom support tool widget.

enable-payto-only.title: Enable PayTo Only
enable-payto-only.description: Enables the PayTo only environment for PayTo only features.
